content: Hi, just tried to use SSR for the first time in a while and got some odd behavior. The replacement I tried was axum::extract::Extension ==>> crate::api::extract::Extension. Using the assist / whatever from vscode didn't do anything after a second or so of appearing to do something, once I had a comment that was correct and applied from that it worked, but only in pattern position. For type position I had to change it to axum::extract::Extension<$a> ==>> crate::api::extract::Extension<$a>. Is this expected?
I also got an error about overlapping ranges for the first one when running it on the whole workspace, but that seems like a small issue in comparison.
